name: uncomprehendingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
without understanding something: He listened uncomprehendingly to her technical explanations. She gazed at him uncomprehendingly when he questioned her. See
uncomprehending
More examplesFewer examplesShe stared uncomprehendingly at the printed words.The taxi driver looked at me uncomprehendingly until I showed him my piece of paper. She sat and stared uncomprehendingly at the screen.
